name: Dal Segno
description: Happiness. Paradise. Words that mean as many different things as there are people in this earth. What does happiness mean to you? What shape does your paradise take?
minimum_requirements: Минимальные: ОС: Windows 7 Процессор: Core 2 Duo Or Better Оперативная память: 512 MB ОЗУ Видеокарта: 128Mb DirectX 9 Compatible Adapter Место на диске: 2100 MB Звуковая карта: Any
